articles.author: Filipp Lebedev, Felix Light, Jessica Donati
articles.title: Exclusive: Wagner lost veteran fighters in Mali ambush, in setback to Russia's Africa campaign - Reuters.com
articles.description: Among the dozens of Wagner mercenaries presumed dead after a lethal battle with Tuareg rebels during a desert sandstorm in Mali in July were Russian war veterans who survived tours in Ukraine, Libya and Syria.
